titleStmt.title: The prophecy of Humphrey Tindal vicar of VVellenger, shewing the downfall of the clergy, and the woefull and miserable condition of this Kingdome. With some other remarkeable passages.
titleStmt.author: Tindall, Humphrey, 1549-1614.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
